storyInfo: A mystery individual invites Silence and Mayer to a bar. They find Muelsyse, head of the Ecological Section, waiting for them. She wants to bargain for information about a prison break.

attributes.content: This... should be the place, right?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Mm. No doubt about it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Neat. Just gotta check, Silence, she really wanted to meet you here?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: This looks like a real-ass bar. In pretty lively shape, too...
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: But nobody's home.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: True. The liquor is all laid out very tidily, with an orderly ambience to match.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Pretty bizarre. Should we head back, maybe? Not long till we gotta get going.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: No. Whoever invited us knows about Anthony's jailbreak, and that he's with us, on top of...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Of?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: We'll be heading off tonight.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Let me check over the miscellanies one more time.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Hm? A message?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I don't remember anyone in this city having my contact info...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Wait, is this... an internal band?!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ms. Silence.
Who are you?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: No one important. What's important is that I know you have Anthony, and you're the one who broke him out.
...I don't know what you're talking about.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: No need to panic. Even if I can't prove it, you can rest assured that I'm no bad actor. Otherwise, I wouldn't go to the trouble of establishing contact with you on an inside wire.
State your intentions.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: All I want is to invite you and Mayer the Engineer out, for a chat.
I'll take that as a yes. Now, the address is...
On top of the fact that she sounded absolutely vile.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Hearing that as soon as I come in hurts me a little, you know.
Whozzit?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Hiya~
I reserved the entire bar. It's just us three all alone here.
I really wanted to chit-chat with you in a normal bar, but in the end, this isn't something we can let just anyone hear.
So, sorries~
You're...
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Alright, let's all introduce ourselves.
I'm the Director of Ecological, Muelsyse.
I remember you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Wowie, you know me? I'm blessed.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: My mentor once mentioned you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Alright, your turn now.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Do you need to ask?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Aww, there's a ritual to these things.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: ...Structural, Silence.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Engineering, Lutra Workshop, Mayer.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I hear you're all with an organization called Rhodes Island now.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: How'd you get mixed up in this, then?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: ...None of your business.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Don't tell me you were behind all this...
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Keheh. I dunno, what do you think?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: No, likely not.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ooh? You sure about that?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: If you could find us yourself, there's no reason you wouldn't know that Anthony has long since left Columbia.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: If you were the hand behind the curtain, a priori, there's absolutely no reason to seek us out.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Hmhmm. True, true.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: If I'm the hidey-hand, I should be running around headless right now looking for Anthony, huh?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But something tells me they won't lie down and take it, ya know? Your bodyguards have any idea how tough they are?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: ...Don't worry yourself.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You sure, eh? Worry I won't, then.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Uh, Silence, time out. If she's not behind all this, then she's...
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: It's not clear to me yet either.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But you're linked to this case, and you want something out of us here.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: This is why you were Director Parvis's star pupil over in Structural. You're a real smarty. I love chatting it up with people like you.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Don't change the subject, Director Muelsyse.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Anthony left Columbia. His assassination has failed. Mayer and I are ordinary people who just so happened to have come to Columbia.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What is it you could want from us, all told?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Aww, relax a little.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I'm ordinary too! Just a researcher here. I pose no imminent threat to you~
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The booze in this bar's four-star, at least. Wanna sit down and chat over some drinks?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Hey. You think we can, Silence?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Oh, fine. I've got things I want to know, too.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Sweet. Lemme take a look, then... I waaant this one!
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Ooh, you've got a sharp eye. I like the Riesling a lot. Not too high proof, but the aroma can strongarm you.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Huh? I'm not actually that good with alcohol...
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Then let me recommend a fruit wine. Very low alcohol content, very friendly flavor.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Really? I'll give it a shot, then.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Goodie. What about you, Ms. Silence?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Plain hot water will be fine.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Aww, you come to a place like this and don't even wanna try anything more fun?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I'm not interested.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Fiiine, fine.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Alright, ladies, have a seat.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Whoa. This is actually really tasty.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Glad you like it.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Can we get to the topic at hand?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We can.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Down to business, then. The way I see it, we both have questions, so we may as well trade answers.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Of course, some questions will be off limits, but let's agree not to play any boring little word games, shall we?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: And in the interest of demonstrating my goodwill, I'll give you one free question before we start. Ask away~
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: How did you find us?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That's a pretty... trivial first question. You sure? I thought you'd ask something more straight to the point.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Please answer the question, Director Muelsyse.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Whether or not you believe me, me and HydeBro's strike teams have nothing to do with each other.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: HydeBro... They're the company who moved against Anthony in this, right?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Righty. You've got history with them. Probably don't need too much introduction.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: HydeBro. Former building materials juggernaut in Bunkerhill City. Once clashed head-to-head with the up-and-coming Simon Co.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Eep. They were up-and-coming back then?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Yes. Simon Co. originally was in the logistics business. By all accounts, the call was made to move into building supplies at a board meeting.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The company was named after the family, and half of its top-floor employees were related to the CEO, Smith Simon.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Including the person at the heart of this affairAnthony Simon, his one and only son.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The short story is, whether it was over or under the table, the two companies fought it out, and they fought hard. To the point of blood, some rumors even say.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And in the end, one can say Simon Co. lost. Ever since, HydeBro has enjoyed a very real monopoly on construction supply commerce in not just Bunkerhill, but surrounding cities as well.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Hmhmm. All correct. Gold star for you.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Ultimately, you all come together in Ironforge City and shook them off. P.S., I've gotta say you did a beautiful job.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: ...But we didn't shake you off.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ahah. Too true.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I see you're not denying you were in league with them.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Hmm... I feel like you've got your guess, honestly speaking.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: But I can tell you, I borrowed their communication channels for sure.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Not like there's room to breathe. If I didn't do this, I'd probably end up the biggest loser out of this whole thing.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: So, I think we can get into grilling each other now. One asks, the other answers. You start.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: No. Let's have you start, Director Muelsyse.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Whoo. Can I?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I want to know what your game is here.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Alrighty. What I wanna know is...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Ms. Silence, how did your helper get in touch with Anthony, and aid him in a successful jailbreak, while in prison? I want a grasp on how that went down.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: That's all in the past. Why do you want to know about it?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Because I don't get how this jailbreak happened at all.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The only parts I understand are the beginning
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: HydeBro initiated this assassination plot they'd been brewing forever against Anthony Simonthe last of the Simonswho was locked up in Mansfield State Prison.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: And then the very end
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: where Anthony led a group that successfully escaped Mansfield, and then met up with you two, and made it out of Columbia.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: As for everything in between... well, I had a chance to find out, but that's slipped away by now. Very sad about that.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: So I want to hear it from you. Just what happened?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: This is not fair at all.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Relax, I'm not here to try and get the whole thing in one single question.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You can toss out your own questions when you see fit, and I'll do my bestest to answer.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Of course, I might have other questions too, but prooobably not that many~
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Okay, being serious, we're only doing this I-ask-you-ask because we still don't know each other that well.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Who can say if once we become friends, we'll let all the beans spill~
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: ...I do not intend to become your friend, and this is going to take an awful amount of time.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Aren't you 'just ordinary people in Columbia' right now? You're not in any sort of rush, are you?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Of course, you're free to turn tail and leave, but. First thing: I have no way to guarantee you'll actually make it out.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Second thing: I have no idea how much you really know, but this is probs your one and only chance to pry intel out of me, Ecological Director Muelsyse. You really wanna let that go?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: ...You're threatening me.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I'm giving you the option that's least likely to get you hurt, Researcher Silence.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Fine. I see you want to know, no matter what, and we're in no rush at all.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Hey, I know this story. Can I just be drawing up some plans on the side here?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Go for it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Kafka... was that your assistant's name?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Don't think I ever saw her name in any list of staff to do with you.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: She isn't a Rhine Lab employee.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Rhine Lab would never hire her, and her interest in scientific research is roughly zero.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Huh. So how do you know each other?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Coincidentally.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But that's another story. All you need to know is she's a friend of mine.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: She's the one who helped me gather all my intel on the Simon family.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ooh? She sounds like a real doer to me.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: And very loyal. Not many people would become a criminal and get thrown in prison for the sake of a friend, would they?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I remunerated her appropriately.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And she had her own goal in being imprisoned
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Her own goal?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: According to her, she always wanted to experience true prison life, just once.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: From her angle, my request must've seemed like I was paying her for it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: ...What an oddball she is.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Undoubtedly. I can't comprehend her sort of mentality, to say the least.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: She sought out a carpenter named Mina to pose as staff when entering the prison, and she got sent in herself as a convict.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Is Mina that one Liberi in your team?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: She is.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: From the sound of it, she was a total third party. Why'd you yank her into this?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I'm not too sure, either. All Kafka said was that Mina once had Anthony's aid, and so would be willing to go inside to help him.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The long and short of it is she accepted my request, and entered Mansfield State Prison...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Royal flush!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Ah-hah. Stayin' on top.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Tsk, damnit. Lost again. Hey, Kafka, you're not cheating, are you?
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: Ain't anyone else's fault you're bad. See? Both Kafka's hands, empty. How's she gonna cheat?
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner B

attributes.content: Yeah, 'zactly.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: (Mumbled) Not my business you hold your cards so crappy I can see 'em.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: But who'da thunk it.
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: First I saw you as some weedy little brat. My shame. You're better than I thought.
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: And you got word from my momma! You're a real friend, fair 'n' square.
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: Hey, hey, hey, how many times I gotta tell ya? I'm already all grown up!
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Hahah, truth! Oughta be callin' you a 'lady!'
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner B

attributes.content: Whoo-wee, Kafka, ma'am!
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner C

attributes.content: Hey, you lot, break time's over.
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: Back to work!
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: Anyone slacking, you can kiss goodbye to your dinner!
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, whatever.
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: Pff. You're just some jailer. Who made you king?
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: What did you say? Speak up.
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: I said, I need a toilet!
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: Hold it in!
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: These jailers have a real bad attitude...
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Hey, Kafka, seeing as you can get a thing or two, I'll give you some advice.
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: Dunno where you muddled on outside, but in Mansfield, I say you'd better keep your tail between your legs, figuratively speaking.
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: Whyzat?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: You know well as me, this is a nomadic prison we're in.
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: Times are it visits cities for supplies, maybe takes on a few new inmates. Otherwise, it roams around the wilderness and nobody gives a hoot.
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: So in here, two and two can make fish. Only law is the jailers' law.
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: I guess so.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Hey, sort of a bright side, though.
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: Outside, it's just us Infected what don't get treated human.
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: But once you're in here, you ain't treated human whoever you are. Bastards in A-Zone don't live any better than we do.
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: I think of that, and I feel swell.
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: A-Zone?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Ah, right, you're fresh. People what ain't Infected get cells in A-Zone, and us Infected get in B-Zone.
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: That's how we know 'em by, anyway. A-Zone, B-Zone.
attributes.name: Infected Prisoner A

attributes.content: Ohh
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Heh. Can't help but say, Kafka, you came in just the right time.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: Uh-huh?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Today's the big event. You're in luck, making it.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: What's the event?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: You'll know damn soon.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Speaking of, what's that room over there for?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Looks like a factory line to me. Why's it split off from our side? No one in there either.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Where d'you mean?
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: Oh, that's C-Zone's special assembly line.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: C-Zone?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: They're the ones living in that tower dead center of the place. That's what we call C-Zone.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: Scarce few there, but they've all made major messes. They'll pretty much be serving all their lives.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: They gotta work too, but it ain't gonna be with us.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: So that's where they do it.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: Ohh... anyone in there called Anthony?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Anthony? Whassup, you know him?
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: Eh, I wouldn't say we know each other. Just heard he was in here too.
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Where else is he gonna be...?
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: Hey. Zip it. You about ready?
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner B

attributes.content: It's starting? Damn, took long enough!
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: Whassappening whassappenning?
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Uh, why do you all look like you're getting together...
attributes.name: Kafka

attributes.content: Kafka, you're new here. Don't try anything today, save you getting hurt.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: Just grab some kinda something and hide.
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A

attributes.content: Here's a front-row ticket to Mansfield's big regular fixturegang fighting!
attributes.name: B-Zone Prisoner A
